  1. More general hypothesis testing
    1. General LRT for composite hypotheses
      1. Well-seperated cases
      2. T-test and one-sample normal model

More general hypothesis testing

Suppose we are interested in testing one of the following sets of hypotheses: \(\begin{array}{rll} H_{0}: \theta=\theta_{0} & \text { vs } & H_{1}: \theta \neq \theta_{0} \\ H_{0}: a \leq \theta \leq b & \text { vs } & H_{1}: \theta<a \text { or } b<\theta \end{array}\)

General LRT for composite hypotheses
